TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChannelFactoryBase`1<TChannel> extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1<!TChannel>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class ChannelFactoryBase(Of TChannel) Inherits ChannelFactoryBase Implements IChannelFactory(Of TChannel)
generic <typename TChannel> public ref class ChannelFactoryBase abstract : System::ServiceModel::Channels::ChannelFactoryBase, System::ServiceModel::Channels::IChannelFactory<TChannel>
type ChannelFactoryBase<'Channel> = class inherit ChannelFactoryBase interface IChannelFactory<'Channel> interface IChannelFactory interface ICommunicationObject

typeparam.name: TChannel
typeparam.span: 處理站所產生之通道的型別。

span.span: The type of channel the factory produces.

summary.span: 提供用戶端上通道處理站的通用基底實作，以建立連接至指定之位址的特定型別通道。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for channel factories on the client to create channels of a specified type connected to a specified address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端上由通道處理站所建立的通道會在伺服器上由通道接聽項所接受。The channels created by channel factories on the client are accepted on the server by channel listeners. 一旦用戶端與服務之間建立了通道連線之後，就可以交換訊息來進行通訊。Once the channel connection is established between client and service, they can communicate by exchanging messages. 會使用指定的位址當做傳出訊息的目的地。The uses the specified address as the destination for outgoing messages. ServiceAddress.Uri 屬性會當做此訊息中的 To 標頭使用。The ServiceAddress.Uri property is used as the To header in the message. ServiceReference.Via 屬性會當做訊息傳送的實體目的地使用。The ServiceReference.Via property is used as the physical destination to send messages to. 這通常與 ServiceAddress.Uri 值相同。This is typically the same as the ServiceAddress.Uri value.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交換訊息時，預設的 建構函式會使用服務模型逾時值來初始化逾時屬性。The default constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages. 若是開啟、傳送和關閉作業，預設值為 1 分鐘；若是接收作業，則為 10 分鐘。The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation. 如果您想要為這些作業逾時指定其他值，請使用 。Use if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要為開啟、傳送、接收和關閉作業逾時指定自訂值，而不要使用服務模型的預設值，請使用 ，而不要使用預設建構函式。Use instead of the default constructor if you want to specify custom values for the open, send, receive, and close operation timeouts instead of using the service model default values.

span.span: The that specifies how long the on-close operation has to complete before timing out.

summary.span: 在指定的時間間隔內關閉與通道處理站相關聯的所有通道。

span.span: Closes all the channels associated with the channel factory within a specified interval of time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會循序嘗試關閉與通道處理站相關聯的所有使用中通道 (不會依照特定的順序)。This method sequentially attempts to close all of the active channels associated with the channel factory in no particular order. 逾時參數是可用來關閉所有通道的累計時間量。The timeout parameter is the cumulative amount of time available for closing all of the channels. 如果其中一個通道的正常關閉作業失敗 (例如，如果此通道發生錯誤，造成例外狀況的擲回)，這個作業就會失敗，而且不會嘗試關閉其餘的通道。If a graceful close of one of the channels fails (for example, if the channel is faulted causing an exception to be thrown) then this operation fails and does not attempt to close the remaining channels. 此方法的失敗會造成處理站及任何其餘通道的中止，而不是關閉。Failure in this method causes the factory and any remaining channels to be aborted rather than closed. 這個方法是由 所呼叫。This method is called by .
